replies.subject: Réponse automatique : From one researcher to another
replies.snippet: Bonjour, Le/la destinataire de ce message a quitté ses fonctions au sein d'INRAE. N'ayant plus accès à sa messagerie, il/elle ne pourra traiter votre demande. Veuillez noter que votre message
replies.body_preview:
Bonjour,
Le/la destinataire de ce message a quitté ses fonctions au sein d’INRAE.
N’ayant plus accès à sa messagerie, il/elle ne pourra traiter votre demande.
Veuillez noter que votre message ne sera pas transféré automatiquement.

Cordialement.

----

Hello,
The recipient of this message does not work for INRAE any more.
As the recipient no longer has access to their email, you will not receive a reply.
Please note that your message will not be forwarded automatically.

Best regar

replies.subject: Re: Hi from Wen, sharing a helpful NIW resource
replies.snippet: Hi Wen, Thanks for reaching out and for the kind words about the EEG paper. I'm an undergraduate at Harvard College, and I was born in the US. I don't know anyone who can benefit from this, but
replies.body_preview:
Hi Wen,

Thanks for reaching out and for the kind words about the EEG paper.

I'm an undergraduate at Harvard College, and I was born in the US. I don't
know anyone who can benefit from this, but it is definitely useful for
these students who are conducting research.

I would just advise to maybe watch the emails you are scraping etc. It's
possible that someone finds this offensive!

Very Respectfully,
Yashvir Sabharwal
Harvard College

On Wed, Dec 3, 2025 at 10:22 PM Wen <albertj

recipients.name: Tassilo Wald
recipients.paper_title: An OpenMind for 3D medical vision self-supervised learning

replies.subject: Re: [Extern] - Hi, Wen here, wanted to share something helpful
replies.snippet: Hey Wen, great to hear that you are interested in doing your thesis in our lab! I think the direction of SSL research is still of great interest to our department and hence, there will be research in
replies.body_preview:
Hey Wen,

great to hear that you are interested in doing your thesis in our lab! I think the direction of SSL research is still of great interest to our department and hence, there will be research in this direction.

However, as I am on the verge of leaving the department early next year, I figured I would forward your request to my colleagues Constantin, Max and Yannick. I am sure one of them will reach out to you for a Zoom call to get to know you and talk about potential projects.

Bes

replies.snippet: Hi Wen, Thank you for reaching out and for sharing this resource. It sounds like a thoughtful tool that could indeed help many early-career researchers who are navigating this pathway. I'll take a
replies.body_preview:
Hi Wen,
Thank you for reaching out and for sharing this resource. It sounds like a thoughtful tool that could indeed help many early-career researchers who are navigating this pathway.
I’ll take a closer look and keep it in mind for students or colleagues who might find it useful. Thanks again for thinking of me and for passing this along.
Wishing you all the best with your work and with TurboNIW.
Best regards,

________________________________

发送时间: 2025

replies.snippet: Hi Wen, Thanks for your email! I already received my green card last year (EB-1A petition), so I might not need the tool. As far as I know, most of my colleagues already got their card. But this tool
replies.body_preview:
Hi Wen,

      Thanks for your email! I already received my green card last year (EB-1A petition), so I might not need the tool. As far as I know, most of my colleagues already got their card. But this tool would be very useful for many other researchers (if it’s NIW only, it would be more useful for those who are not born in China or India because they do not have the long queuing time). I guess you could try to contact those people, or extend its function to multiple types of I140 applicatio

replies.subject: Re: Greetings from Wen, a resource you might find helpful
replies.snippet: Hi Wen, Thank you again for your message and for sharing TurboNIW — it's an impressive project and I think it can really help many researchers. At the moment, I'm in the process of completing
replies.body_preview:
Hi Wen,


Thank you again for your message and for sharing TurboNIW — it’s an impressive project and I think it can really help many researchers.


At the moment, I’m in the process of completing my PhD dissertation, so I can’t apply for other programs yet. But I appreciate you thinking of me.


Your work actually reminded me of a similar project created by some friends of mine from Kazakhstan who are now building startups in the U.S.:

https://www.instagram.com/porttus.ai?igsh=MTRlZX

replies.body_preview:
Hi Wen,

I hope this email finds you well, and thank you for your email.

Thank you for sharing the NIW solution you developed with me - it is a thoughtful effort and resource for the others, and I wish you continued success.

Although I’m a U.S. citizen and grew up in the United States, and don’t personally need NIW assistance, I am grateful you shared this with me, and I’d be glad to share your website with international students who might find it helpful.

Additionally, feel free to r

Thank you for reaching out! This platform is exactly what I need and what I was looking for.

I want to apply through the EB2 route using NIW to get my green card, but I honestly wasn't sure if I have the right documents or if my case is strong enough.

I would love to schedule a free consultation call with the team to get a better understanding!

Best,
Aditya

work. I truly appreciate your thoughtful message and the resource you

TurboNIW sounds like a very helpful tool, especially for researchers
navigating the NIW process. At the moment, I’m not looking to pursue this
pathway, but I genuinely appreciate you considering me and sharing
something that could benefit many others.

Wishing you all the best with your platform and future endeavors!

Warm regards,
Is

recipients.name: Hojun Son
recipients.paper_title: Quantifying Context Bias in Domain Adaptation for Object Detection

replies.subject: Re: Hello from Wen, a resource for NIW applications
replies.snippet: Hi Wen, Thank you for reaching out to me. Here is my opinion. I will recommend the turboNIW to someone who wants to file themselves. I am a Korean, so I know the Korean community has some guidelines
replies.body_preview:
Hi Wen,

Thank you for reaching out to me.
Here is my opinion.

I will recommend the turboNIW to someone who wants to file themselves.
I am a Korean, so I know the Korean community has some guidelines for DIY
NIW applications, but not as a tool.
It would be great to have multiple options for filling up.
However, the critical point is the legal responsibility.
I was with my lawyer because of the responsibility.
It would be better for turboNIW to consider the fact.

Sincerely,
Hojun
